Rulings.Edison:
●The Ignition Effect targets 1 monster on the field.
●Tributing 1 Six Samurai monster (including this card) you control is a cost. If Soul Exchange targets your opponent's Six Samurai monster, you can Tribute it as cost instead.
●If the target is flipped face-down, it is still destroyed.
Rulings.Tengu:
(1) While you control another Six Samurai monster, you can Tribute 1 Six Samurai monster to destroy 1 monster on the field.
●The (1) Ignition Effect targets 1 monster on the field.
●Tributing 1 Six Samurai monster (including this card) you control is a cost. If Soul Exchange targets your opponent's Six Samurai monster, you can Tribute it as cost instead.
●If the target is flipped face-down, it is still destroyed.

Rulings.Cat:
● If an effect is chained that removes every face-up 'Six Samurai' monster from your side of the field, 'Hand of the Six Samurai's' effect still resolves.
● Tributing 1 'Six Samurai' monster you control is a cost. You can Tribute 'Hand of the Six Samurai' to activate its own effect.
Rulings.TeleDAD:
● If an effect is chained that removes every face-up 'Six Samurai' monster from your side of the field, 'Hand of the Six Samurai's' effect still resolves.
● Tributing 1 'Six Samurai' monster you control is a cost. You can Tribute 'Hand of the Six Samurai' to activate its own effect.

Rulings.Base:
1. If an effect is chained that removes every face-up 'Six Samurai' monster from your side of the field, the effect of "Hand of the Six Samurai" still resolves.
br>2. Tributing 1 'Six Samurai' monster you control is a cost. You can Tribute "Hand of the Six Samurai" to activate its own effect.
